question: Which state offers Insurance cover for crops with the implementation of the Pradhan Mantri Fasal Bima Yojana (PMFBY)?
explanation: he Haryana Government announced immediate implementation of the Pradhan Mantri Fasal Bima Yojana (PMFBY) to help farmers avail of insurance cover against crop loss due to natural calamities for 2017-18. The farmers would have to pay only two per cent premium of the sum insured for Kharif crops and one per cent premium of sum insured for Rabi crops.
